interview_ask_lastname:
Fill registration data. 

Please, input your last name:
interview_ask_passport:
Input your passport data, exactly as in document. 

Series, number, issue date:
interview_ask_regaddress:
Your registration address. 

 Postal index, city, street, house, apartment:
interview_ask_confirm: Check your data, please, press **'OK'** to confirm...
validation_use_letters: We are sorry, but your input seems to be incorrect, only letters allowed.
validation_invalid_phone: Sorry, the phone number entered is not valid.
validation_format_phone: Sorry, the phone number entered is not in a recognized format.
validation_not_date: Sorry, the date entered does not match the required format dd.mm.yyyy.
validation_format_url: Sorry, the URL is not well-formed.
validation_invalid_url: Sorry, the URL is not valid.
mainmenu_inline_message: Now you can use me [inline](https://telegram.org/blog/inline-bots), congratulations
mainmenu_help_message:
The bot is controlled using quick navigation commands and through the "Main menu".

To call the Main menu, use the command /start. 

Commands are entered starting with the symbol "/", for example: "/language". 

A list of available commands can be accessed by pressing the "Menu" button in the lower left corner of the bot control window.
registration_await_result: Your data was sent, await confirmation...
registration_failed: Failed to update data, could be connection fail...
admin_collect_csv_response: proceeding database, don't start any process until complete
admin_send_all_confirmation_request: sending messages to all users from database, print "active" to ignore those, who blocked the bot, else "include blocked", timeout 15 seconds:)
admin_send_list_file_request: sending messages tu users from list, .txt file with ids is awaited, utf-8 encoded, each id from new line, timeout 60 seconds:
admin_send_await_repost: repost here message to send, timeout 60 seconds:
admin_send_started: sending messages, don't start any process until complete
